scl10.uk.ac.aber.users.manipulators

Class WarpManipulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • scl10.uk.ac.aber.users.manipulators.WarpManipulator

  • public class WarpManipulator
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used for applying warp based operations to a 2d array of doubles.
    Author:
    Scott Lockett

      • convertMatrixToWarp

        private static double[][] convertMatrixToWarp(@NonNull
                                              org.opencv.core.Mat matrix)
        Converts a matrix of warp values into a 2D array of warp values
        Parameters:
        matrix - The matrix which it to be converted into a 2D array. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        a 2D array of doubles containing the warp values.

      • convertWarpToMatrix

        private static org.opencv.core.Mat convertWarpToMatrix(@NonNull
                                                       double[][] warp)
        Converts a 2D array of warp values into an openCV Mat object
        Parameters:
        warp - The warp which is to be converted into a mat object. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        The warp as a mat object

      • downsample

        public static double[][] downsample(@NonNull
                                    double[][] warp)
        Downsamples a given warp by a given size.
        Parameters:
        warp - The warp that is to be downsampled. cannot be null.
        Returns:
        A downsampled version of the input warp.

      • multiplyEachValueInMatByAFactor

        private static org.opencv.core.Mat multiplyEachValueInMatByAFactor(@NonNull
                                                                   org.opencv.core.Mat matrixToMultiply,
                                                                   double factor)
        Loops through every values within a single channel matrix and multiplies each value by a given factor.
        Parameters:
        matrixToMultiply - The matrix that values need multiplying by a factor. Cannot be null.
        factor - The factor that each value will be multiplied by.
        Returns:
        The matrix with each of its values multiplied by the factor.

      • upsample

        public static double[][] upsample(@NonNull
                                  double[][] warp,
                                  @NonNull
                                  org.opencv.core.Size newSize)
        Upsamples a given warp file by a given size.
        Parameters:
        warp - The warp that is to be upsampled. Cannot be null.
        newSize - The desired size of the warp.cannot be null.

        The new size MUST be the warp's (width * 2) +/- 1 and the warp's (height * 2) +/- 1.

        Returns:
        An upsampled version of the input warp.

      • writeWarpFile

        public static boolean writeWarpFile(@NonNull
                                    java.io.File fileToWriteTo,
                                    @NonNull
                                    double[][] warp)
        Writes a warp 2D array of doubles out to a given file
        Parameters:
        fileToWriteTo - The file which is going to be written to, if the file does not already exists, it will be created. Cannot be null.
        warp - The warp that holds the values that are going to be written to within the file. cannot be null.
        Returns:
        true is the file was successfully written to, or false if an exception was thrown during the writing.
